response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its true worth to be $1,200,000 to me. However, I understand that your valuation might differ based on your specific needs and circumstances. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent investment for your business. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
